description: Schema for submitting version of software.
title: Software version

___software.description: Unique name of the software package.
___software.title: Software

___version.description: The version of a particular software.
___version.comment: The version string when version option is used on the software.
___version.title: Version

___downloaded_url.description: An external resource to track version for the software downloaded.
___downloaded_url.title: Download URL

___download_checksum.description: The checksum of the particular version of software used.
___download_checksum.comment: Prefer SHA-1 of commit id if available, otherwise use md5sum of downloaded software,
___download_checksum.title: Download checksum
